Html:
Hi,
I want to draw my custom lines with label on a GMap.
At first, I use system.graphics from GMap, but I can't obtain what I want.
So I use Microsoft Visual Basic PowerPack: I create a PowerPack shape container in which I put my lines and add it to the same panel of the GMap and all work fine, I see my lines with label.

My problem: when I drag the map, my lines disappear.
I put the redraw of the lines in paint event of the map and I can see my lines, but only when I finish to drag the Map.
How can I see my lines during map dragging?
Which event must I trap?
I can also use another method instead Microsoft Visual Basic PowerPack...

Thanks
use markers/routes instead, if you want static lines, then overload OnPaintOverlays
